# Simple URL Shortener

This tool is not meant for permanent URL shortening, in fact it only keeps the URL for 60s

No requests are logged, ever.

## Create a short URL

```
curl --request POST \
  --url http://localhost:58773/new \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
	"url": "https://html-gpt.rankun.net/gpt.html?"
}'
```

Response will simply be:

```
http://localhost:58773/go/icLXssYVOkMDuSbwbRTrM
```
